entityA.svg: <svg viewBox="0 0 400 400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><circle cx="200" cy="200" r="150" fill="#ffcc00" id="body"/><ellipse cx="150" cy="170" rx="30" ry="20" fill="#993300" id="face"/><line x1="130" y1="190" x2="170" y2="190" stroke="#993300" stroke-width="2" id="mouth"/><circle cx="140" cy="160" r="5" fill="#ffffff" id="eye1"/><circle cx="160" cy="160" r="5" fill="#ffffff" id="eye2"/><rect x="140" y="210" width="20" height="10" fill="#ffcc00" id="arm1"/><rect x="240" y="210" width="20" height="10" fill="#ffcc00" id="arm2"/><rect x="180" y="250" width="10" height="40" fill="#ffcc00" id="leg1"/><rect x="210" y="250" width="10" height="40" fill="#ffcc00" id="leg2"/></svg>

report.appearance: EntityA has evolved into a creature with a large circular body, oval-shaped face, two round eyes, and rectangular arms and legs.
report.reason: Evolution is driven by the need for better stability and mobility.
report.thought: Feeling stronger and more balanced in this new form.

entityB.svg: <svg viewBox="0 0 400 400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><rect x="100" y="150" width="200" height="200" fill="#6600cc" id="body"/><ellipse cx="200" cy="130" rx="40" ry="30" fill="#ffcc00" id="face"/><path d="M170 180 Q200 220 230 180" fill="none" stroke="#ffcc00" stroke-width="2" id="mouth"/><circle cx="180" cy="120" r="7" fill="#ffffff" id="eye1"/><circle cx="220" cy="120" r="7" fill="#ffffff" id="eye2"/><polygon points="120,200 100,250 150,250" fill="#6600cc" id="horn1"/><polygon points="280,200 300,250 250,250" fill="#6600cc" id="horn2"/><rect x="150" y="250" width="20" height="10" fill="#6600cc" id="leg1"/><rect x="230" y="250" width="20" height="10" fill="#6600cc" id="leg2"/></svg>

report.appearance: EntityB has transformed into a creature with a rectangular body, oval face, curved mouth, and horned head.
report.reason: Evolution is influenced by the need for improved defense and communication signals.
report.thought: Feeling more confident and assertive with these new horns.
